column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I dine out often but I don't usually write reviews.  We went to Bavettes on a Friday as a walk in because there were no reservations available(always booked and I see why).  We were seated immediately at 6:15pm. We ordered shrimp Dejohgne( nice flavor)
column3: and smoked trout Ceasar salad(surprisingly very good).  We shared the pork chop(melt in your mouth seasoned... Excellent )
column4: and elotes corn(oh my... kinda good).  Great service
column6: and nice Atmosphere.  We will definitely be back!
